prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Name: Sivaprasad Taduri		                              	 Mobile: 9490358469
Hyderabad					   	           	  Email: sivaprasadt.pbi@gmail.com		
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Having 12+ years hands on relevant experience in working with Business Intelligence & ETL tools such as Azure Data Factory, Data bricks, Power BI, SQL Server, pyspark.
Build and maintain data ingestion, transformation, and loading (ETL) pipelines using Azure Data bricks and Data factory, including data cleaning, normalization.
Created catalogs and schemas in Data bricks work space.
Develop and manage data processing workflows using Data bricks Jobs, including scheduling, dependency management, and error handling.
Understanding of distributed computing principles, data partitioning, and performance optimization for large datasets.
Implementation of Slowly Changing Dimensions in Data Factory Data Flows and Data Bricks Notebooks.
Designing ETL architecture to extract the data from various sources to Data ware house, Source to Target mapping, validations. 
Provided production support for Azure Data Factory pipelines, ensuring data processing tasks were completed accurately and on time.
Expert in data analysis, migration, modeling, integration and data warehousing concepts.
Experience on Creating of Power BI reports from different source systems.
Work closely with data engineers and business stakeholders to understand data needs, translate business requirements into technical solutions, and deliver data insights.
WORK EXPERIENCE
Worked as a senior Software engineer at Photon Interactive private limited, Hyderabad from July 2022 to Dec 2024.
Worked as a senior Software engineer at Global energy consulting engineer’s private limited, Hyderabad from April 2012 to July 2022.
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS
Completed B.Tech. In Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad, India.
TECHNICAL SKILL
PROJECTS
DESCRIPTION
	Sentara is one of the largest health systems in the
